intro: The v-slide-group component is used to display pseudo paginated information. It uses v-item-group at its core and provides a baseline for components such as v-tabs and v-chip-group.

active.heading: Active class
active.intro: active-class prop allows you to pass a class to customize the active items.

customicon.heading: Custom icons
customicon.intro: You can add your custom pagination icons instead of arrows using the next-icon and prev-icon props.

pseudo.heading: Pseudo Carousel
pseudo.intro: Customize the slide group to creatively display information on sheets. Using the selection, we can display auxillary information easily for the user.
